title: Athletics at the 2013 East Asian Games
text:
The <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> events at the <a href="2013%20East%20Asian%20Games">2013 East Asian Games</a> were held in <a href="Tianjin">Tianjin</a>, <a href="China">China</a> from 7 to 9 October.
Four <a href="List%20of%20East%20Asian%20Games%20records%20in%20athletics">Games records</a> were broken at the competition.
